345b5: tshe/ gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal
345b6: te bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te brtson
345b7: 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bsam gtan gyi
345b8: pha rol du phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol du
346a1: phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te nang stong pa nyid
346a2: chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te phyi stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa
346a3: zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/
346a4: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
346a5: phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chen po stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes
346a6: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te don dam pastong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
346a7: tshe/ gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'dras ma byas
346a8: stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
346b1: chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid chags pa
346b2: 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am mchags pa zhes
346b3: bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
346b4: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
346b5: phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
346b6: do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi
346b7: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du
346b8: phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
347a1: gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
347a2: pa'i tshe/ gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yang
347a3: dag par spong ba rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
347a4: chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dbang po rnams chags pa 'am ma chags
347a5: pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te stobs rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/
347a6: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab
347a7: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
347a8: rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
347b1: do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bsam gtan rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
347b2: pa'i tshe/ gal te tshad med pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs med pa'i snyoms
347b3: par 'jug pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad chags pa'am ma
347b4: chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu chags pa'am ma chags pa
347b5: zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar
347b6: mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
347b7: dra phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de
347b8: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
348a1: byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
348a2: pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mi 'jigs pa bzhi chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi skyed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de// de shes rab kyi pha rol du
348a3: phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
348a4: spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te byams pa chen po chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
348a5: gal te snying rje chen po chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la stod pa'i tshe/ gal te
348a6: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
348a7: gal te thams cad shes pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lam
348a8: kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam pa thams
348b1: cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/
348b2: gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'du shes chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya
348b3: bar 'du shes pa med do/ / 'du byed chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rnam par shes pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mig
348b4: chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / rna ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sna chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med
348b5: do/ / lce chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lus chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// yid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med
348b6: do/ / gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sgra chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// dri chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
348b7: med do/ / ro chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// reg chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// chos chags pa'am ma chags
348b8: pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / mig gi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chags pa'amam chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
349a1: med do/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lus kyi rnam
349a2: par shes pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa chags pa'am ma chags
349a3: pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lce'i
349a4: 'dus te reg pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am
349a5: ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags
349a6: ba 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
349a7: chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// yid kyi 'dus
349a8: te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / sa'i khams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// chu'i khams chags
349b1: pa 'amam chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / me'i khams chags pa'am mchags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rlung gi khams chags pa 'am mchags pa zhes bya ba
349b2: 'du shes pa med do/ / nam mkha'i khams chags pa 'amam chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'a
349b3: shes pa med do/ / ma rig pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'du byed chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rnam par shes
349b4: bachags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / ming dang gzugs chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// skye mched drug chags pa'am ma
349b5: chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / reg pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// tshor ba chags pa'am mchags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med
349b6: do/ / sred pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// len pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'dra shes pa med do// srid pa chags pa 'am
349b7: ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / skye ba chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rga shi chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du
349b8: shes pa med do/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags
350a1: ba zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha
350a2: rol du phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//
350a3: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//
350a4: phyi stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid chags
350a5: pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / chen po stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid chags
350a6: pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid chags pa
350a7: 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
350a8: pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rang bzhin stong
350b1: ba nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rang gi mtshan nyid
350b2: stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid chagasas pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//
350b3: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
350b4: stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams chags pa
350b5: 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// dbang po rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar
350b6: 'du shes pa med do/ / stobs rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'dra shes pa med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'phags pa'i lam
350b7: yan lag brgyad pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// bsam gtan rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya
350b8: bar 'du shes pa med do/ / tshad med pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//
351a1: rnam par thar pa brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'dugs pa med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snrums par 'jug pa dgu chags pa'am mchags pas
351a2: bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mngon par shes pa rnams
351a3: chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa 'am ma chags
351a4: pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes
351a5: bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// byams pa chen po chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du
351a6: shes pa med do/ / snying rje chen po chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
351a7: pa med do/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
351a8: pa med do/ / phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// dgra bcom pa nyid chags pa lam ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rang byang
351b1: chub chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
351b2: 'das de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'bel ma bstan kyang mi 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
351b3: de de bzhin no/ / rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su me 'grib bstan kyang yongs su mi 'phel ma bstan kyang mi 'phel lo// rab 'byor
351b4: 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam satsho'i bar du bzhugs shing nam mkha'i legs pa'am ma legs pa brjod kyang / nam mkha' ni
351b5: legs pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa med do/ / nyes pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa med do// nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do// nyes pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do// rab 'byor/
351b6: 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do// nyes pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do// legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba med do// nyes pa brjod
351b7: kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin ma bstan kyang de bzhin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
351b8: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe// zhum pa dang ga yeng bar mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson par
352a1: bgyid cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog pa ni dka' ba babyed pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
352a2: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa ste/ nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// 'du shes ma mchis so// 'dra
352a3: byed ma mchis so/ / rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni mig ma mchis so// rna ba ma mchis so// sna ma mchis so// lce ma mchis so// lus ma mchis so// yid ma mchis so// nam mkha' ni
352a4: gzugs ma mchis so/ / sgra ma mchis so// dri ma mchis so// ro ma mchis so// reg ma mchis so// chos ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis
352a5: so/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so//
352a6: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni
352a7: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
352a8: ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni sa'i khams ma mchis so// chu'i khams ma mchis
352b1: so/ / me'i khams ma mchis so// rlung gi khams ma mchis so// nam mkha'i khams ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni ma rig pa ma mchis so// 'du byed ma mchis so// rnam par
352b2: shes pa ma mchis so/ / ming dang gzugs ma mchis so// skye mched drug ma mchis so// reg pa ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// sred pa ma mchis so// len pa ma mchis so// srid pa ma mchis so// skye ba ma
352b3: mchis so/ / rga shi ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi
352b4: rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so// phyi stong pa nyid ma mchis so// phyi
352b5: nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// chen po stong pa nyid ma mchis so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
352b6: ma mchis so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so// chos
352b7: thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma
352b8: mchis so/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis so// yang dag par spong ba rnams ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
353a1: pa rnams ma mchis so/ / dbang po rnams ma mchis so// stobs rnams ma mchis so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
353a2: brgyad pa ma mchis so/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so// bsam gtan rnams ma mchis so// tshad med pa rnams ma mchis so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
353a3: pa rnams ma mchis so/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mad
353a4: pa dang / smon pa med pa ma mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ma mchis so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
353a5: stobs bcu ma mchis so/ / mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma mchis so// byams pa chen po ma mchis so// snying rje chen po ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos
353a6: ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ma mchis so/ / nam mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// dgra
353a7: bcom pa nyid ma mchis so/ / rang byang chub ma mchis so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis so// /
353a8: ye d+ha rmA he tra pra b+ha bA he tran teSh+Than ta thA ga to h+ya ba tad/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bI dI ma hA shra ma NaH// sarba pA pa s+ya ka ra Na/ kra sha la s+yo pa sam+ba daM/ sAtsit+ta pa ri dmanu ye ta bud d+hA d+ha shA sa na//
